price: 27. et seul restera le Visage (Wajh) de ton Seigneur, à la Majesté Suprême et à l’Infinie Noblesse.
arabic: وَيَبۡقَىٰ وَجۡهُ رَبِّكَ ذُو ٱلۡجَلَٰلِ وَٱلۡإِكۡرَامِ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wayabqā wajhu rabbika dhū al-jalāli wal-ik'rāmi
